events.message: We received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department as a developer role based on your resume and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to assist you through the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your profile and technical skills appear to meet the requirements for the developer position.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming interview and providing additional details about your previous software projects.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10:00 AM UTC to discuss your software development experience and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview has been completed successfully. The interviewers noted strong engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
We have arranged an HR interview for April 23rd to further discuss your fit within the team culture and company values.
The HR interview went well with positive feedback regarding communication skills and alignment with company culture.
We have extended an official offer for the software engineer position including details on compensation, benefits, and start date.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to become part of our engineering team.
You have formally accepted our job offer for the software engineer role. We look forward to welcoming you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started with introductions to your team and setup of necessary development tools and access.
The hiring process has been successfully completed and you are now officially part of the engineering team.
